name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Edenreach - Turn Your Sales Navigator into a Lead Generation Machine

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Export qualified leads from LinkedIn Sales Navigator, find prospects emails, write InMails with AI Agents, and automate tasks.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🆓 Free to use with lifetime credits

Unlock the true potential of LinkedIn Sales Navigator with EdenReach – your all-in-one solution for lead scraping & export, email finding, writing personalized InMails & messages with AI agents, and automation with smart sequences.

🧰 Key Features:

🔍 Export leads from Sales Navigator:
    * One-click export of leads directly from LinkedIn Sales Navigator.
    * Export name, headline, experiences, skills, languages, educational background, websites, social medias, phone number, email, number of followers, company information & more ...
    * Organized exports into dedicated folders for easy management.
    * Leads are cleaned and enriched for optimal quality during export.

 💌 Get Verified Business Emails:
    * Find valid, verified business emails from Sales Navigator effortlessly.
    * Advanced algorithms guarantee high accuracy and reliability.
    * Pay only for successful email discoveries – no wasted credits!

🤖 AI-Driven InMails & Outreach Messages:
    * Generate highly personalized outreach messages and InMails using AI.
    * AI templates tailored to each lead’s profile for maximum engagement.
    * Save time and boost response rates with automated, high-quality messaging.

 🔄 Automate Your Sales Workflows:
    * Set up sequences to automatically send messages, InMails, and invitations.
    * Automate follow-ups and reminders effortlessly.
    * Focus on closing deals while EdenReach manages routine tasks.


✔️ Qualify Your Leads:
    * Ensure leads meet your exact criteria with manual qualification.
    * Filter out unqualified prospects quickly and easily.
    * Concentrate on high-potential leads for better conversion rates.

🔧 Advanced Lead Filtering:
    * Target leads with premium accounts, open profiles, and more.
    * Utilize robust filters for precise lead targeting.
    * Easily find your ideal prospects.

 📥 Drop CSV & Refresh Data Instantly:
    * Upload a CSV with LinkedIn URLs and get real-time updated lead data.
    * Ensure your lead information is always fresh and accurate.
    * Simplify your workflow with seamless data refreshes.

📞 Extract Public Phone Numbers:
    * Retrieve public phone numbers from LinkedIn profiles.
    * Enhance your outreach strategy with direct phone contact.
    * Ensure you have the most accurate and up-to-date information.

 📊 Export to Excel/CSV or Your CRM:
    * Effortlessly export your leads to Excel or CSV formats.
    * Integrate directly with your CRM through Zapier.
    * Manage, analyze, and utilize your leads like a pro.


Why EdenReach Stands Out ❤️:
* Efficiency: Automate repetitive tasks and focus on what matters – closing deals.
* Engagement: Personalized AI messages drive higher response rates.
* Scalability: Easily manage and qualify thousands of leads.
* User-Friendly: Designed for all skill levels with no coding required.
* Sales Growth: Increase your conversion rates with high-quality leads.


EdenReach transforms your LinkedIn Sales Navigator experience, making it the ultimate tool for modern sales and outreach. Install EdenReach today and propel your business to new heights! 🚀
